body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. cast a creature with unleash
2. chose yes or no
3. read the notification... 


usually may-notifications state the choice, written in brackets and blue
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Enhancement request: Unleash notification does not state whether yes or no was chosen

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 023b961941ca .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 29, 2014 20:53:20_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. cast a creature with unleash
2. chose yes or no
3. read the notification... 


usually may-notifications state the choice, written in brackets and blue
